Earth.name: Hei Bai
Earth.description: Guardian spirit of a forest that normally assumes the form of a panda bear, but transforms into an aggressive monster with six limbs when enraged

moves.name: Six-Claw Assault
moves.description: Hei Bai lashes out with its six limbs, dealing significant physical damage.

moves.name: Frenzied Charge
moves.description: The Hei Bai attacks all players with in rapid frenzy, reducing their defense and increasing its own attack for three counts

moves.name: Soothing Touch
moves.description: The Hei Bai heals itself by draining the energy from the opponent, reducing their attack power.

moves.name: Unbreakable Forest
moves.description: The Hei Bai puts up a defensive shield made of the forest wood, and uses the power of the earth to make 6 consecultive attacks, dealing damage to the opponent.

moves.name: Verdant Wrath
moves.description: The Hei Bai makes a bamboo cage for the opponent, and then crushes them into the ground to suffocate them.

Air.name: Wolf Spirit
Air.description: The wolf spirit is a ferocious beast and guardian who acts as a servant to the Mother of Faces, choosing the paths for her seasonal travels through Forgetful Valley.

moves.name: Lupine Slash
moves.description: The Wolf Spirit slashes the opponent with its sharp claws, wounding the target greatly.

moves.name: Howl of The Valley
moves.description: The Wolf Spirit howls into the valley, calling upon the Mother of Faces to temporarily erase the memory of the opponent. The Wolf receives no damage from the next two attacks.

moves.name: Fire-Drinking Breath
moves.description: A Fire-type heals the Wolf Spirit by draining the energy from the opponent, reducing their attack power.

moves.name: Spirit-Moth Hurricane
moves.description: The Wolf Spirit breathes out a hurricane made of a thousand spirit moths, stunning the opponent and dealing 5 counts of damage and defense reduction.

moves.name: The Mother's Calling
moves.description: The Wolf Spirit calls upon its creator, the Mother of Faces, to protect it. The Mother of Faces then uses a sacred fire to burn the opponent, and heals the Wolf in equal measure.

Fire.name: Koh The Face Stealer
Fire.description: Koh the Face Stealer is one of the most ancient and knowledgeable spirits in all of the Spirit World. He is a malevolent entity with the body of an enormous centipede-like creature and resides under an ancient tree in the Spirit World.

moves.name: Emotion Drain
moves.description: Koh inflicts an emotion-based debuff on all enemies. Fear (opponent HP below 50%)- 30% defense reduction. Anger (opponent attack above 50) - 30% attack reduction. Grief (opponent defense above 40) - stun for 1 turn.

moves.name: Web of Deceit
moves.description: Koh casts an illusion over the battlefield for 2 turns. This blinds the attacker, and stuns the opponent, and reduces their defense.

moves.name: Face of Deception
moves.description: Increases opponent attack by 20%, but at the same time decreases their defense by 60%.

moves.name: Steal Face
moves.description: Koh mimics the previous attack made by the opponent at 150% of its power.

moves.name: Spirit Step
moves.description: Koh uses its power to make an explosion and step partially into the spirit world to gain a number of buffs.

Water.name: Amon
Water.description: Amon is a powerful politician, who's only goal is to create an 'equal world' by nullifying all bending. He is secretly a waterbending master, and is especially skilled at the art of bloodbending, which he uses to sever one's connection with their element.

moves.name: Human Domination
moves.description: Amon uses his powerful combat abilities to pummel the opponent, and instill a deep sense of fear and defeat into them. This reduces their defense and attack.

moves.name: Thrum of Blood
moves.description: Amon channels the power of blood and chi-bending, stealing the blood of the opponent to heal himself. This reduces opponent attack power, and this renewed energy allows Amon to dodge the opponent's attack.

moves.name: Bloodlust
moves.description: Amon uses the power of bloodbending to slowly drain the blood of the opponent, giving him their power. This increases his stats over several turns.

moves.name: Nullify
moves.description: Amon nullifies the elemental powers of the opponent entirely, and annihilates them on the spot.

moves.name: Torrent of Power
moves.description: Amon uses the power of waterbending to launch himself of a tornado of water, dodging all opponent attacks. At the same time, all opponents are sucked into the tornado, stunned, and damaged continuously for 3 turns.
